resources.string: Password too short, enter minimum 6 characters!
Authentication failed, check your email and password or sign up
Do not have an account.Get Registered now!
We just need your registered Email Id to sent you password reset instructions.

1) First add your rooms in which the devices are installed. 

 2) Then add your WIFI name and password. 

 3) Now when you go out without swtiching on/off the devices, based on your past habits you will be notified.

 4) Now from outside also you can control your devices through this app.

 5) If you want to switch on your device then you have to send ON to the sim (inserted in the device) or if you want to send switch off your device then you have to send OFF.

Quick start 

 1)Each device tab represents one remote recipient of sms messages(commands).Each recepient has it's own name and phone number. 

 2)Each button within a device sends one predefined sms message to that number. Button has a visible label (friendly name) and a message(sms content) which will be sent. 


 Privacy Policy

 1)This application has no way of knowing anything about your home alarm system, car alarm, personal details or anything similar.
 This app does not collect any personal data and does not send anything back to the developer.

 2)Getting any kind of response to the message sent, it depends completely on the remote device. This application has no influence or knowlwdge about that.
